mapper.select: select pageSeq, pageAddress, pageMain from contactpage where 1=1 order by pageSeq
select pageSeq, pageAddress, pageMain, contactAdd_contSeq from contactpage where 1=1 and pageSeq = #{pageSeq} order by pageSeq
mapper.update: update contactpage set pageAddress = #{pageAddress}, contactAdd_contSeq = #{contactAdd_contSeq}, pageMain = #{pageMain} where pageSeq = #{pageSeq}
